      Methods in citicide with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void MySystem.addGroup​(Group group)
      This method adds a group to MySystem
      void Project.addGroupVoters​(Group group)
      This method adds a arrayList of groupVoters a new group
      void User.addMembership​(Group group)
      This method adds a group to the membership arrayList
      double Group.affinityReport​(Group group)
      This method returns the affinity report calculated by the following formula: (N12+N21)/(N1+N2).
      protected boolean Project.checkVotes​(User voter, Group group)
      This method evaluates whether a given user, is already supporting a project by belonging to any groups that support it or not.
      void User.joinUserGroup​(Group group)
      It calls the function joinGroup and adds the name of the group to the membership array
      void User.leaveUserGroup​(Group group)
      It calls the function leaveGroup and deletes the name of the group from the membership array
      void Project.unvoteProject​(Group group, User user)
      This method handled the possible situation when an user leaves a group, and that groups were supporting this project, so this subroutine will decrement by one the number of votes of the project only if the user is not supporting the project individually (or by belonging to other group that also supports the project) too.
      void MySystem.update​(Group g)
      This method checks whether the information of group g is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from system we need to specified it with its parameters
      void Project.update​(Group g)
      This method checks whether the information of group g is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from project we need to specified it with its parameters
      void User.update​(Group g)
      This method checks whether the information of group g is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from user we need to specified it with its parameters
      void Project.voteGroup​(Group voter)
      This method evaluates whether a given group vote for the instance of the project or not, if it can support the project, then the project will increment by the number of members of the group, their number of votes.
      Method parameters in citicide with type arguments of type Group
